original_text: Now when the congregation was broken up, many of the Jews and religious proselytes followed Paul and Barnabas: who, speaking to them, persuaded them to continue in the grace of God.
korean_text: 회당의 모임이 흩어진 후에 유대인과 유대교에 입교한 경건한 사람들이 많이 바울과 바나바를 따르니 두 사도가 더불어 말하고 항상 하나님의 은혜 가운데 있으라 권하니라

sentences.original_text: Now when the congregation was broken up
many of the Jews and religious proselytes
persuaded them to continue in grace of God
